bug.author: kartikdutt18
bug.summary: Fix the Azure Build for Windows.
bug.description: Hey everyone, As most of you can see, We haven't had a green build on Azure for the past few days. This mainly arises due to a catch test failure on Windows VS15 due to RandomForestSerialization Test. This issue aims to attract attention to the same and hopefully resolve the same. Please feel free to take up this issue. I am also marking this issue as a good first issue. Thanks.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kartikdutt18>@kartikdutt18</denchmark-link> , I had made the PR on moving Random Forest from boost tests to catch2 tests. I can take this up.
Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Abilityguy>@Abilityguy</denchmark-link> , Great. Let me know if you face any issues. Thanks.
